Text: Great morning discussing 21st Century Cures implementation with one of our youngest patient advocates, Max ->pic.twitter.com/0B9HPRxSRH

This #SubHealth hearing is a great thing for many reasons. Most notably, it’s a reminder of how Republicans and Democrats came together to get a monumental piece of legislation signed into law despite our divided times.

Cures provides the NIH and the FDA with billions of dollars in much-needed resources so that our nation’s best and brightest can work on finding cures for diseases that impact virtually every single family.
When we began the process of crafting 21st Century Cures four years ago, we began with one goal in mind: Helping patients and their families.

We PASSED the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act. Here’s what it does:
 Lowers tax rates for everyday Americans
 Increases the standard deduction
 Eliminates special interest deductions and closes loopholes
 Repeals the death tax
 Stops American jobs from moving overseas

New report from @USChamber says #TaxCutsAndJobsAct will lead to the creation of an additional 29,168 jobs and raise after-tax incomes for Michigan middle-class families by more than $2,000.
Cornerstone Chamber of Commerce on #TaxCutsAndJobsAct: These actions will help improve our local small business community and overall economic environment.
. @swmfirst on #TaxCutsAndJobsAct: This tax reform will create more and better jobs for Americans and reignite the American dream.

. @CornerstoneMGSW on #TaxCutsAndJobsAct: Today’s passing of the...tax reform legislation through the U.S. House of Representatives makes the country more competitive and will benefit Michigan as we continue to win more industry.
Thx for feedback - I understand the importance of this issue and believe it will be closely examined as the House and Senate move forward.
Bottom line: This tax plan will put more money in the pockets of Michigan families and I’m hopeful we can get something to the president’s desk before the end of the year.

The current tax code is indefensible. I haven’t met a single person or visited a single small business that thinks the status quo is acceptable. The time for tax reform and relief is now – and we are delivering on our promise.
The #TaxCutsAndJobsAct will specifically help Michigan middle-class families by increasing the standard deduction and expanding the Child Tax Credit.

This historic tax reform package will lower individual income tax rates except for the top bracket, simplify the entire code, create jobs, and boost our Southwest Michigan economy. #TaxCutsAndJobsActpic.twitter.com/f9kRZepH77

The time for tax reform is NOW. Learn more about our efforts here: https://upton.house.gov/taxreform/

It has become abundantly clear that our outdated tax code is a major drag on our economy and on Michigan families struggling to get by.  That is why I support efforts to advance pro-growth, pro-American tax reform and relief.
I've heard countless stories from constituents impacted by a tax code that is outdated, unwieldy, and too often rewards special interests at the cost of regular folks.
Plain and simple: our tax system is broken. It has not been updated since 1986 and since that time has become a complicated mess.
